short_summary: G9292-241740-001-XU-A TBIPS Tier 2 RFP - ESDC SAP Renewal
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on December 5, 2022 by 2:00 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 p.m. EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
duration_in_months: When issuing this document, the announcer reads out the following:",
